violations: Missing PPE: Workers may not be wearing hard hats, vests, and gloves
Improper equipment usage: Construction materials are not neatly organized
Blocked pathways: Obstructions in walkways and areas that could impede movement
locations: General construction area where workers are present
Near the center of the site where scattered materials are visible
Throughout the site where materials block clear pathways
recommendations: Ensure all workers have and are using appropriate PPE such as hard hats and gloves
Organize construction materials properly for safe access and movement
Clear pathways and ensure emergency exits are unobstructed
